Package com.android.application

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BluetoothConfigurationClass
    Stores structured information about each Bluetooth connection.
    BluetoothConfigurationClass.Profiles
    class containing MAC addresses for the various methods of evaporation (by default Secure Simple Pairing mechanism)
    C
    Stores structured information about each controller, by default available in the application, as well as the types of items available for building your own.
    C.Requirements
    defines a list of all the possible requirements that may be needed to run some of the defined controllers.
    ConnectionsConfigurationClass
    It stores all data collected from the server during establishing connection that application needs.
    ControllerDefinition
    It defines the structure of each controller, located in the application.
    CustomControllerDefinition
    Extension of ControllerDefinition, containing an additional field for an identifier of custom controller in the database, which is stored additional information about it.
    FunctionalityCheck
    Checks the availability of services in the mobile device.
    MultiPlayApplication
    The main class of the application, which stores basic global parameters for the entire application, such as a reference to the database application, statement of sensors, services and their availability, the list of available connections globally, both by Bluetooth and Wi-fi, the main threads to communicate with the server .
    N
    Configuration class for network communication within Android and PC devices.
    N.Device  
    N.DeviceDataCounter  
    N.DeviceSignal  
    N.Exit  
    N.Helper  
    N.Shift  
    N.Signal
    byte signal = N.Signal.encodeSignal(N.Signal.NEED_CONNECTION, N.System.WINDOWS); Log.d("APP",String.valueOf( signal)); Log.d("APP",String.valueOf( N.Signal.decodeSignal(signal))); Log.d("APP",String.valueOf( N.Signal.decodeSystem(signal)));
    N.System  
    SenderWF  
    WirelessConfigurationClass
    Stores structured information about each Wi-fi connection.
